ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
ISPICKVAL(CP_Empanelment_Stages__c, "Registered") && (
ISBLANK(CP_Name__c) || ISBLANK(RERA_Number__c)|| ISBLANK(Name) || ISBLANK( Email__c) || ISBLANK( Phone)|| ISBLANK( Rera_Expiry_Date__c ) || ISNULL( Rera_Expiry_Date__c ) || Rera_Certificate_Upload__c != true )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter mandatory fields to change the Status to Registered.
